verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Search me O God and know my heart today Try me O Savior Know my thoughts I pray See if there be Some wicked way in me Cleanse me from every sin And set me free{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I praise Thee Lord For cleansing me from sin Fulfill Thy Word and Make me pure within Fill me with fire where once I burned with shame Grant my desire To magnify Thy Name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord take my life And make it wholly Thine Fill my poor heart with Thy great love divine Take all my will My passion self and pride I now surrender Lord In me abide{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Holy Ghost revival Comes from Thee Send a revival Start the work in me Thy Word declares Thou wilt supply our need For blessings now O Lord I humbly plead{/lang-eng}
